description: Carrying the spirit of the inception of the nation with a hue taken from the flag, this new rare beauty embodies the passion and sacrifice made in 1971. By construction, the jacquard weaved fine cotton fabric features patterns inspired by the stripes of the Royal Bengal Tiger. The Premium Collection is an exclusive selection of elegant, superior quality designs.
care: Do not iron over the label

Carrying the spirit of the inception of the nation with hue taken from the flag, this new rare beauty embodies the passion and sacrifice made in 1971. description: Crafted from two-ply ultra fine cotton that is further treated with liquid ammonia for maximum antibacterial and antimicrobial conditioning, this elegant style wears off white and black hues. The entire presentation is enhanced by ILLIYEEN signature buttons along with the contrast cuffs and collars featuring damask patterns perfecting the unforgettable aesthetics. The LUXURY Collection comprises of minimalistic, impeccable designs crafted from the worlds finest materials.
